name: Dragon Treasure
description:
This is an action game about finding treasure. You have to play as a warrior, kill monsters through multiple levels, and finally challenge the BOSS to win the treasure.

weapon

During the game, you can use flamethrowers, grenades, homing missiles and other weapons to help you kill monsters.

enemy

During the game, you may encounter mutant spiders, flying maggots, mutant stars, spaceships, evil robots and more.
Don't rely too much on bombs or you'll lose your edge in the mid to late game.
Come on, keep fighting. Keep dashing forward to find the real dragon treasure!
